nextgen.core.alignment
Class AbstractPairedEndAlignment

java.lang.Object
  nextgen.core.annotation.AbstractAnnotation
      nextgen.core.annotation.BasicAnnotation
          nextgen.core.alignment.AbstractPairedEndAlignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<Annotation>, Alignment, Annotation
Direct Known Subclasses:
FragmentAlignment, PairedReadAlignment
public abstract class AbstractPairedEndAlignment
extends BasicAnnotation
implements Alignment

Author:
prussell

Nested Class Summary
static class AbstractPairedEndAlignment.TranscriptionRead
          This enumerator represents with of the mates in the read pair (or neither for unstranded library) is in the direction of transcription
